segments.text: This kitchen is a total mess with that overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water just wasting everywhere, soaking the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, clueless, drying a grimy plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a slob, not even checking the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those filthy kids pawing into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on a rickety stool, probably dropping crumbs all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand out, greedy for stolen sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so unhygienic with water and dirt mixing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, probably not even clean yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden's neat, but inside it's repulsive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such neglect in a home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the water before it floods the place completely.
segments.speaker: PAR
